contents.text: Thank you for calling PlanGrid, San Francisco’s leading construction software platform for general contractors, subcontractors, and project owners.
To speak with our sales team or discuss a new account, press 1.
To schedule a product demonstration or learn about pricing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for product demos and pricing.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demo and get a custom pricing quote
I’d like to schedule a PlanGrid demo and get pricing for my veteran-owned contracting business.
Schedule a product demo to review API integration features and enterprise licensing tiers.
Could someone walk me through PlanGrid’s features and explain its pricing?
Hello, I’d like to schedule a demo of PlanGrid and discuss pricing options for my lab project.

contents.text: For billing, invoicing, or payment inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review my recent invoice charges and update payment method
I have a billing question about a recent invoice and need to update my payment method.
Get an itemized invoice and clarification on usage-based billing for our last quarter.
I’d like assistance with my billing statement and to make a payment.
I need to review a recent invoice and clarify the charges on my account.

contents.text: For existing customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a sync error in the mobile app
I’m having trouble syncing project files in the PlanGrid app and need technical support.
Troubleshoot a sync failure (error 500) when uploading project blueprints via the REST API.
I’m having trouble with the app and need technical support to fix it.
I’m having an issue syncing my drawings in the app and need technical troubleshooting.

contents.text: For account administration, user permissions, or subscription changes, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our account services team.

navigationGoals: Add a new user to my account and set their permissions
I need to add a new user to my account and upgrade our subscription plan.
Upgrade our subscription plan to Enterprise and assign admin permissions to a new project manager.
I need to update my subscription and manage who can access my account.
I want to update user permissions on my account and change our subscription plan.
